title: Observing the localization of light in space and time by ultrafast second-harmonic microscopy
title_cn: 通过超快二次谐波显微镜观察光在空间和时间上的定位
abstract: Multiple coherent scattering and the constructive interference of certain scattering paths form the common scheme of several remarkable localization phenomena of classical and quantum waves in randomly disordered media. Prominent examples are electron transport in disordered conductors, the localization of excitons in semiconductor nanostructures, surface plasmon polaritons at rough metallic films or light in disordered dielectrics and amplifying media. However, direct observation of the fundamental spatiotemporal dynamics of the localization process remains challenging. This holds true, in particular, for the localization of light occurring on exceedingly short femtosecond timescales and nanometre length scales. Here, we combine second harmonic microscopy with few-cycle time resolution to probe the spatiotemporal localization of light waves in a random dielectric medium. We find lifetimes of the photon modes of several femtoseconds and a broad distribution of the local optical density of states, revealing central hallmarks of the localization of light.
abstract_cn: 多重相干散射和某些散射路径的相长干涉形成了经典和量子波在随机无序介质中几种显着定位现象的通用方案。最突出的例子是无序导体中的电子传输，半导体纳米结构中激子的定位，粗糙金属膜上的表面等离激元极化子或无序电介质和放大介质中的光。但是，直接观察本地化过程的基本时空动力学仍然具有挑战性。对于在非常短的飞秒时间尺度和纳米长度尺度上发生的光的定位，尤其如此。在这里，我们结合二次谐波显微镜与几个周期的时间分辨率来探测随机介电介质中光波的时空定位。我们发现光子模式的寿命为数飞秒，并且状态的局部光密度分布较宽，从而揭示了光局部化的中心特征。

title: Electrically driven single-photon source at room temperature in diamond
title_cn: 室温下电动金刚石单光子源
abstract: Single-photon sources that provide non-classical light states on demand have a broad range of applications in quantum communication, quantum computing and metrology. Single-photon emission has been demonstrated using single atoms, ions, molecules, diamond colour centres and semiconductor quantum dots. Significant progress in highly efficient and entangled photons sources has recently been shown in semiconductor quantum dots; however, the requirement of cryogenic temperatures due to the necessity to confine carriers is a major obstacle. Here, we show the realization of a stable, room-temperature, electrically driven single-photon source based on a single neutral nitrogen-vacancy centre in a novel diamond diode structure. Remarkably, the generation of electroluminescence follows kinetics fundamentally different from that of photoluminescence with intra-bandgap excitation. This suggests electroluminescence is generated by electron–hole recombination at the defect. Our results prove that functional single defects can be integrated into electronic control structures, which is a crucial step towards elaborate quantum information devices.
abstract_cn: 按需提供非经典光状态的单光子源在量子通信，量子计算和计量学中具有广泛的应用。使用单原子，离子，分子，钻石色心和半导体量子点已证明了单光子发射。最近，在半导体量子点中显示了高效纠缠光子源的重大进展。然而，由于必须限制载流子而需要低温温度是主要障碍。在这里，我们展示了一种新型金刚石二极管结构中基于单个中性氮空位中心的稳定，室温，电动单光子源的实现。值得注意的是，电致发光的产生与动力学完全不同于带内激发的光致发光。这表明电致发光是由缺陷处的电子空穴复合产生的。我们的结果证明，功能单一缺陷可以集成到电子控制结构中，这是迈向精细量子信息设备的关键一步。

title: Giant half-cycle attosecond pulses
title_cn: 巨大的半周期阿秒脉冲
abstract: Half-cycle picosecond pulses have been produced from thin photoconductors when applying an electric field across the surface and switching on conduction using a short laser pulse. The transverse current in the wafer plane then emits half-cycle pulses in a normal direction, and pulses of 500 fs duration and 1 × 106 V m−1 peak electric field have been observed. Here, we show that single half-cycle pulses with a duration of 50 as and up to 1 × 1013 V m−1 can be produced when irradiating a double foil target with intense few-cycle laser pulses. Focused onto an ultrathin foil, all electrons are blown out, forming a uniform sheet of relativistic electrons. A second layer, placed some distance behind, reflects the drive beam but lets electrons pass straight through. Under oblique incidence, beam reflection provides the transverse current, which emits intense half-cycle pulses. Such a pulse may completely ionize even heavier atoms. With these developments, new types of attosecond pump–probe experiments will become possible.
abstract_cn: 当在整个表面上施加电场并使用短激光脉冲导通时，薄的光电导体会产生半周期皮秒脉冲。然后，晶片平面中的横向电流沿法线方向发射半个周期的脉冲，脉冲持续时间为500＆fsfs和1＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 <sup> 6 </ sup>＆已经观察到＃160; V＆＃160; m <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>峰值电场。在这里，我们显示了持续时间为50＆＃160; as直至1＆＃160;＆＃215;＆＃160; 10 <sup> 13 </ sup>＆＃160; V＆＃160的单个半周期脉冲当用强烈的几个周期的激光脉冲照射双箔靶时，可以产生; m <sup>＆＃8722; 1 </ sup>。将所有电子聚焦到超薄箔片上，形成均匀的相对论电子片。在其后方一定距离处的第二层反射驱动光束，但使电子直接通过。在倾斜入射下，束反射会提供横向电流，该横向电流会发出强烈的半周期脉冲。这样的脉冲甚至可以将更重的原子完全电离。随着这些发展，新型的阿秒泵研究将成为可能。</ p>

title: All-optical Compton gamma-ray source
title_cn: 全光康普顿伽玛射线源
abstract: One of the major goals of research for laser-plasma accelerators is the realization of compact sources of femtosecond X-rays. In particular, using the modest electron energies obtained with existing laser systems, Compton scattering a photon beam off a relativistic electron bunch has been proposed as a source of high-energy and high-brightness photons. However, laser-plasma based approaches to Compton scattering have not, to date, produced X-rays above 1 keV. Here, we present a simple and compact scheme for a Compton source based on the combination of a laser-plasma accelerator and a plasma mirror. This approach is used to produce a broadband spectrum of X-rays extending up to hundreds of keV and with a 10,000-fold increase in brightness over Compton X-ray sources based on conventional accelerators. We anticipate that this technique will lead to compact, high-repetition-rate sources of ultrafast (femtosecond), tunable (X- through gamma-ray) and low-divergence (∼1°) photons from source sizes on the order of a micrometre.
abstract_cn: 激光等离子加速器研究的主要目标之一是实现飞秒X射线的紧凑来源。特别是，利用现有激光系统获得的适度电子能量，康普顿已提出将光子束从相对论电子束中散射出来，作为高能和高亮度光子的来源。然而，迄今为止，基于激光等离子体的康普顿散射方法尚未产生高于1kev的X射线。在这里，我们提出了一种基于激光等离子体加速器和等离子镜的组合的康普顿源的简单而紧凑的方案。与基于传统加速器的康普顿X射线源相比，该方法用于产生宽达100 keV的X射线宽带光谱，并且亮度提高了10,000倍。我们预计，该技术将产生来自以下尺寸的紧凑，高重复率的超快（飞秒），可调谐（X-通过伽马射线）和低发散（＆＃8764; 1＆＃176;）光子。微米的量级。

title: Structured illumination microscopy using unknown speckle patterns
title_cn: 使用未知斑点图案的结构化照明显微镜
abstract: Using spatially non-uniform illumination significantly improves the resolution of light microscopy. Indeed, frequency mixing between the object and the illumination permits the recovery of object frequencies beyond the diffraction-limited detection band pass. However, the image reconstruction process requires a precise knowledge of the illumination patterns (usually focused or periodic) and therefore sophisticated stable mountings. Here, we show, both theoretically and experimentally, that image reconstruction can be performed without knowing the illumination patterns, provided that their average is roughly homogeneous over the sample. Using blind structured illumination microscopy (blind-SIM), a resolution about two times better than that of conventional wide-field microscopy is obtained by simply illuminating the sample with several uncontrolled random speckles. Our approach is insensitive to specimen or aberration-induced illumination deformations, does not require any calibration step or stringent control of the illumination, and dramatically simplifies the experimental set-up.
abstract_cn: 使用空间不均匀照明可显着提高光学显微镜的分辨率。实际上，物体和照明之间的频率混合允许超过衍射极限检测带通的物体频率的恢复。但是，图像重建过程需要对照明图案有精确的了解（通常是聚焦的或周期性的），因此需要复杂的稳定安装。在这里，我们在理论上和实验上都表明，只要不平均照明模式，就可以执行图像重建，前提是它们的平均值在样本上大致相同。使用盲结构照明显微镜（blind-SIM），只需简单地用几个不受控制的随机散斑照亮样品，即可获得比传统宽视野显微镜高约两倍的分辨率。我们的方法对标本或像差引起的照明变形不敏感，不需要任何校准步骤或严格控制照明，并大大简化了实验设置。

title: Direct generation of multiple excitons in adjacent silicon nanocrystals revealed by induced absorption
title_cn: 感应吸收揭示相邻硅纳米晶体中直接产生多个激子
abstract: The enhancement of carrier multiplication in semiconductor nanocrystals attracts a great deal of attention because of its potential in photovoltaic applications. Here, we present the results of investigations of a novel carrier multiplication mechanism recently proposed for closely spaced silicon nanocrystals in SiO2 on the basis of photoluminescence. Using ultrafast pump–probe spectroscopy rigorously calibrated for the number of absorbed photons, we find that adjacent nanocrystals are excited directly upon absorption of a single high-energy photon. We demonstrate efficient carrier multiplication with an onset close to the energy conservation threshold of twice the bandgap, 2Eg. Moreover, with absorption of a single high-energy photon under low pump fluence conditions, it was found that carrier–carrier interaction was significantly suppressed, but the amplitude of the signal was enhanced. We show that these results are in excellent agreement with the dependence of photoluminescence quantum yield on excitation, as reported previously for similar materials.
abstract_cn: 由于其在光伏应用中的潜力，半导体纳米晶体中载流子倍增的增强引起了极大的关注。在这里，我们介绍了基于光致发光，最近提出的一种新颖的载流子倍增机制的研究结果，这种载流子倍增机制是针对SiO 2 中的紧密间隔的硅纳米晶体。使用针对吸收的光子数进行严格校准的超快泵光谱技术，我们发现相邻的纳米晶体在吸收单个高能光子后直接被激发。我们展示了有效的载波倍增，其起始能量接近带隙2E g 的两倍的节能阈值。此外，发现在低泵浦注量条件下通过吸收单个高能光子，可以显着抑制载流子相互作用，但是信号幅度增强。我们证明，这些结果与光致发光量子产率对激发的依赖性极好一致，如先前报道的类似材料。

title: Phase-locked coherent modes in a patterned metal–organic microcavity
title_cn: 金属有机微腔中的锁相干相干模式
abstract: Organic microcavities offer tantalizing prospects for studying the interactions of light and matter. For electrical excitation of these processes, electrodes must be integrated. However, the large absorption properties of metals are generally considered fatal for optical coherence. With this in mind, we embedded a thin silver grating into an organic microcavity to generate periodic arrays of localized cavity modes and metal-based Tamm plasmon polaritons. These excited states are capable of phase coupling across the grating. At room temperature and under non-resonant pumping, we selectively stimulated coherent emission from in- and out-of-phase locked arrays. We show that an absorptive metal inside an optical cavity is compatible with coherent emission. Most importantly, the inherently low residual absorption of the organic layer enables coherence to spread over macroscopic distances, even at room temperature. Our strategy of embedding metal patterns into an organic microcavity yields a viable route towards electrically driven organic solid-state lasers.
abstract_cn: 有机微腔为研究光与物质的相互作用提供了诱人的前景。为了对这些过程进行电激励，必须集成电极。然而，金属的大吸收特性通常被认为对光学相干性是致命的。考虑到这一点，我们将薄的银光栅嵌入有机微腔中，以生成局部腔模和基于金属的Tamm等离子体激元极化子的周期性阵列。这些激发态能够在整个光栅上进行相位耦合。在室温和非共振泵浦下，我们选择性地刺激了同相和异相锁定阵列的相干发射。我们表明，光学腔内的吸收性金属与相干发射兼容。最重要的是，有机层固有的低残留吸收性使得即使在室温下，相干性也可以扩展到宏观距离。我们将金属图案嵌入有机微腔的策略为通向电驱动的有机固态激光器提供了一条可行的途径。

title: Wrinkles and deep folds as photonic structures in photovoltaics
title_cn: 皱纹和深褶皱作为光伏中的光子结构
abstract: Some of the simplest light-harvesting systems in nature rely on the presence of surface structures to increase internal light scattering. We have extended this concept to increase the efficiencies of man-made solar energy harvesting systems. Specifically, we exploit the wrinkles and deep folds that form on polymer surfaces when subjected to mechanical stress to guide and retain light within the photo-active regions of photovoltaics. Devices constructed on such surfaces show substantial improvements in light harvesting efficiencies, particularly in the near-infrared region where light absorption is otherwise minimal. We report a vast increase in the external quantum efficiency of polymer photovoltaics by more than 600% in the near-infrared, where the useful range of solar energy conversion is extended by more than 200 nm. This method of exploiting elastic instabilities of thin, layered materials is straightforward and represents an economical route to patterning photonic structures over large areas to improve the performance of optoelectronics.
abstract_cn: 自然界中一些最简单的光收集系统依靠表面结构的存在来增加内部光散射。我们扩展了这一概念，以提高人造太阳能收集系统的效率。具体来说，当受到机械应力时，我们利用在聚合物表面形成的皱纹和深褶皱将光引导并保留在光伏组件的光敏区内。在这样的表面上构造的设备显示出光收集效率的显着提高，特别是在光吸收最小的近红外区域。我们报告说，在近红外中，聚合物光伏的外部量子效率大大提高了600％以上，其中太阳能转换的有用范围扩展了200纳米以上。这种利用薄的分层材料的弹性不稳定性的方法非常简单，它是在大面积上构图光子结构以提高光电性能的一种经济途径。
